content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROCESSING OF PERSONAL INFORMATION\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"-webkit-font-smoothing\":\"antialiased\",\"box-sizing\":\"border-box\",\"font-size\":\"11pt\",\"font-style\":\"inherit\",\"font-weight\":\"inherit\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree and expressly authorize that EPAM and the EPAM Systems, Inc. Group of Companies may collect, use and disclose, locally and internationally, any personal information contained in your application file for certain administrative and other purposes relating to your consideration employment, including for example sharing such information with company clients who you may perform services for in your prospective position. You also acknowledge that EPAM and the EPAM Systems, Inc. Group of Companies may transfer any such personal information among themselves or with outsourced payroll or benefits providers as necessary for the purpose of human resources, payroll and benefit administration relating to your prospective employment with the Company.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"-webkit-font-smoothing\":\"antialiased\",\"box-sizing\":\"border-box\",\"font-size\":\"10pt\",\"font-style\":\"inherit\",\"font-weight\":\"inherit\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The personal data subject is entitled to exercise the right to access such data at intervals no shorter than six months entirely free of charge, unless there is proof of a legitimate interest in such access in shorter periods, as established in Section 14, Sub-section 3 of Act No. 25,326. The Agency of Access to Public Information, in its function of controlling agency responsible for enforcing Act No. 25,326, has the attribution to receive the reports and complaints filed in connection with the infringement of personal data protection regulations.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"-webkit-font-smoothing\":\"antialiased\",\"box-sizing\":\"border-box\",\"font-size\":\"10pt\",\"font-style\":\"inherit\",\"font-weight\":\"inherit\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"[El titular de los datos personales tiene la facultad de ejercer el derecho de acceso a los mismos en forma gratuita a intervalos no inferiores a seis meses, salvo que se acredite un interés legítimo al efecto conforme lo establecido en el artículo 14, inciso 3 de la Ley Nº 25.326. LA AGENCIA DE ACCESO A LA INFORMACIÓN PÚBLICA, en su carácter de Órgano de Control de la Ley N° 25.326, tiene la atribución de atender las denuncias y reclamos que interpongan quienes resulten afectados en sus derechos por incumplimiento de las normas vigentes en materia de protección de datos personales.]\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"-webkit-font-smoothing\":\"antialiased\",\"box-sizing\":\"border-box\",\"font-size\":\"10pt\",\"font-style\":\"inherit\",\"font-weight\":\"inherit\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/argentina/all-cities.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a collection of EPAM rules and policies where you can always find current information on the rules in your location. It was created to help you understand all aspects of company procedures and the benefits of being an EPAM employee. The Handbook covers many topics on which employees frequently have questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Employee Handbook is the main source of company rules and policies, so please make sure you read and understood its contents.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Employee Handbook consists of different subject areas with a wealth of useful can sometimes update the Employee Handbook in order to best reflect the company’s business needs or other changes, e.g. in local \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"will help make your work at the company more Operations\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK ACKNOWLEDGMENT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By acknowledging below I am confirming I have received access to the most recent version of the \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Anywhere Argentina Handbook (\\\"Handbook\\\")\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and that I read it, understood it, and agree to comply with it. I understand that EPAM has the maximum discretion permitted by law to interpret, administer, change, modify, or delete the rules, regulations, procedures, and benefits contained in the Handbook at any time, with or without notice. No statement or representation by a supervisor or any other employee, whether oral or written, can supplement or modify this Handbook. Changes can only be made if approved in writing by the Chief People Officer. I also understand that any delay or failure by EPAM to enforce any rule, regulation, or procedure contained in the Handbook will not constitute a waiver of EPAM’s right to do so in the future.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EMPLOYEE DOMICILE DECLARATION ACKNOWLEDGMENT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You were required, prior to your first day of work for EPAM, to fill out and sign with pen-and-ink signature the employee domicile declaration form. The form has been provided to you. In the event your address changes at any time before or after you begin your EPAM employment, you are further required to update the form with the new address information and submit to the Anywhere people team.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Failure to fill out, sign, or promptly update the domicile declaration form may result in disciplinary action, up to and including termination of employment.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You also agree to execute with pen-and-ink signatures any other documents required by EPAM to be obtained prior to the commencement of your employment.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
